long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Automatically does Wordplay review in the background. 

All you have to do is login through the extension by clicking on it, and the rest is done for you. 

If the extension ever stops working press the reset button and re-enter your username and password.

If it gets a word wrong, refresh the page and manually enter a translation for the current word. Then you can restart the extension.

Also for best results install an adblock extension.
